name: enterprise-graphql-sever
author: Nolin D Naidoo <nolinnaidoo77@gmail.com> (https://www.linkedin.com/in/nolindnaidoo/)
description: An flexible GraphQL server starter template built using Node, Express, Express-GraphQL, and GraphQL.

scripts.start: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/server.js
scripts.build: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node server/server.js
scripts.buildCI: yarn run pre && cross-env NODE_ENV=ci node server/server.js
scripts.dockerImage: yarn run pre && yarn run pre && docker build -t enterprise-graphql-server .
scripts.dockerContainer: yarn run pre && docker run -it -p 3002:3001 enterprise-graphql-server
scripts.buildDocker: yarn run dockerImage && yarn run dockerContainer
